Message:
“So, it seems that what they call
the Holy Night’s miracle is a legend
that says, ‘Confess your love under
the large tree in the town square.
Then, the love you seek
will be yours.’

That’s why...
Hm? Stella, are you okay?”

Her face was as bright as a tomato,
and she froze in place...
Oh, she’s slowly wobbling away...

Um... When you’re
not feeling well,
be sure to stay warm
and sleep early, okay...!
It didn’t seem like
she was sick, though...

Hah... Well, putting that aside,
what am I going to do about
Mister Apprentice’s present...?
